text: Henri Reznik in 2014 Henri Markovich Reznik (; born 11 May 1938, in Leningrad) is a prominent Russian lawyer, former criminal investigator and criminologist. He chaired the presidium of the Moscow City Bar Association.Структура Российского еврейского конгресса . Reznik was teaching Kutafin Moscow State Law University since 2009.
